entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
